<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>933</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Crossword - Roofs</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama - Tejados</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal – Díonta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel - Dächer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé - Toits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword - Telhados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate - Tetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταυρόλεξο - στέγες</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive crossword (Requires Java) which covers terms and definitions relating to Roofs. Can be compeleted online or on a printed sheet.</string>
            <string language="es">Un crucigrama interactivo (requiere Java) que trata sobre términos y definiciones relacionados con tejados. Puede ser cumplimentado en línea o en una hoja impresa.</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal idirghníomhach (Teastaíonn Java) a chlúdaíonn téarmaí agus sainmhínithe a bhaineann le díonta. Is féidir é a dhéanamh ar líne nó ar bhileog priontáilte.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Construction Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios de construcción</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Tógála</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Building Superstructure</string>
            <string language="es">Superestructura de construcción</string>
            <string language="ga">Forstruchtúr Tógála</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Relevant Websites</string>
            <string language="es">Páginas web relevantes</string>
            <string language="ga">Láithreáin Ghréasáin Bhainteacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein interaktives Kreuzworträtsel (benötigt 
Java), das Bezeichnungen und Definitionen in bezug auf Dächer 
umfaßt. Kann sein compeleted online oder auf einem gedruckten 
Blatt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des mots croisé interactifs (exige Java) qui 
couvrent des limites et des définitions concernant des toits. 
Peut être compeleted en ligne ou sur une feuille imprimée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um crossword interativo (requer Java) que cubra os
termos e as definições que se relacionam aos telhados. Pode 
ser compeleted em linha ou em uma folha impressa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lle parole incrociate interattive (richiede Java) 
che riguardano i termini e le definizioni concernente i tetti. 
Può essere compeleted in linea o su un foglio stampato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα διαλογικό σταυρόλεξο (απαιτεί την Ιάβα) που 
καλύπτει τους όρους και τους ορισμούς σχετικά με τις στέγες. 
Μπορέστε να είστε on-line ή σε ένα τυπωμένο φύλλο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbau-Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebäude-Überbau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relevante Web site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études de Construction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Superstructure de Bâtiment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sites Web Appropriés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Da Construção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Superstructure Do Edifício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web site Relevantes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Della Costruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sovrastruttura Della Costruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web site Relativi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτες κατασκευής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτίζοντας εποικοδόμημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχετικοί ιστοχώροι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
